thread.title: Isaiah Thomas pumps up LeGarrette Blount in Tom Brady jersey
thread.title_full: Isaiah Thomas pumps up LeGarrette Blount in Tom Brady jersey

title: Isaiah Thomas pumps up LeGarrette Blount in Tom Brady jersey
text:
The “King of the Fourth” switched New England sports venues Saturday night. 
Boston Celtics star Isaiah Thomas made the trek to Gillette Stadium, where he was on the sideline for the New England Patriots’ divisional-round playoff game against the Houston Texans. Once there, he helped Patriots running back LeGarrette Blount, a frequent attendee at TD Garden for C’s games, get pumped up for the big game. Video: Celtics Isaiah Thomas, in his Brady jersey, gets fired up with LeGarrette Blount pic.twitter.com/ZIOsPE1S2q — Ben Volin (@BenVolin) January 15, 2017 
As you probably can tell in the video, Thomas was wearing a Tom Brady jersey, which makes sense, considering the two Boston sports stars text each other “frequently” after meeting during the Celtics’ free-agency pitch to Kevin Durant last summer. Isaiah Thomas in the house supporting the Pats tonight pic.twitter.com/KpTlvQeKWE — Michaela Vernava (@MichaelaNESN) January 15, 2017 
It appears Thomas, who played his college basketball at Washington, has split allegiances, though, as he showed love for the Seattle Seahawks on Friday, when he attended the team’s walk-through while the Celtics were in Atlanta to play the Hawks. Thomas hit the winning shot in that game, too. Tacoma native, @Celtics guard & @UW_MBB great @Isaiah_Thomas was on hand at walk thru's and shared his hype for tomorrow night. #GoHawks pic.twitter.com/Dxn3oY6z2E — Seattle Seahawks (@Seahawks) January 14, 2017 
That hype didn’t exactly work, though, as Matt Ryan torched the Seahawks in the Atlanta Falcons’ 36-20 win .
